catalog_info.title: Research in International Economics
catalog_info.notes: Marc Melitz and members of the Department. Popularly known as the International Lunch.
catalog_info.description: Participants discuss recent research in international economics and present their own work in progress. Open to doctoral students in economics who have passed their oral examinations. Students must complete both parts of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
